"Hi there, little guy," she said cheerfully, "I'm Maya Fey. Who are you?"

"So, how are you so small?" Maya asked.

"I honestly don't know," you replied, "I was in my room minding my own business, when this bright light shines and knocks me out. Next thing I know, I'm here and shrunk down to a few inches."

"Well, that's interesting," Maya said placing her free hand against her chin. She thinks for a moment before looking back at you and clasping her other hand around the one holding you. "Hey, you need help, right?" she asked and you nodded, "Well, would you like me to take care of you? It'll be fun having you around when I'm not helping Nick out. What do you say?"

142.content:
-Author Note-


Same intro as always everyone. You wake up, you don't know shit, you see a giantess, you realize you're a speck, blah blah blah, yada yada yada, ect ect ect. But for the heck of it, let's make a story already.


You open your eyes and feel your head over like someone just hit you with a brick. Whatever happened last night must've really taken it's toll on you. You can't even remember what you did the whole day yesterday. Not even the day before. In fact, you just realized that you couldn't remember anything about yourself beyond waking up just a few seconds ago. It was almost as if you've just suffered from some form of amnesia. Whatever was going on, it was scaring the shit out of you. But as much as you wanted to go outside and find out what had happened to you, you had something more pressing that you needed to figure out. Namely, where the Hell were you right now?

It was surprisingly easy, there were many folds in the cloth to grab and push off of, making it much easier than you had initially suspected. You dared not look up or down, but you could feel the young spirit medium's gaze, as if it were pushing you down.

"Um, Pearl? Could you please not stare so hard?"

So much for that, you thought. Perhaps... "Well, what's so fun about it? You're just sitting there, right?"

You felt yourself enveloped in pink as the girl shuffled herself to a more reclined position, thinking on your words. "Well..." She began. Still with eyes full of cloth, you could feel her gaze return. "I dunno! It just feels funny, that a tiny person is climbing on me! It makes me feel big! It's like... It's like I'm a planet! Yeah, Planet Pearl, with the brave little explorer!" She squealed, overjoyed at the thought. If she was a giant, you felt you could see her perspective. Even if she were stomping through the streets tall as buildings, at least everyone would be experiencing what you were now.

How would Pearl react to that? Everyone running scared, as the gargantuan eight-year-old gleefully skipped through the city, each step shaking the earth as she delighted in what a big girl she was, all grown up. Even if she played exclusively with you, at least you'd be normal sized, and others aware of your plight. But as it stood, Pearl wasn't a planet, but she was your whole world.

I'm a terrible person, you thought.

Well, i guess i should start at the beginning. Where the Yatagarasu first began." Kay cleared her throat as she began her long story of the Great Thief Yatagarasu.


"Long before the name Yatagarasu ever came into being, my father, prosecutor Byrne Faraday, and my uncle, detective Tyrell Badd, had a strong friendship and partnership. The two worked on many cases together and eventually came across the Amano Group, which they found to have connections to an international smuggling ring. They also found a single witness willing to testify against them: Cece Yew, an employee of the Amano Group, who was subsequently put under the protection of uncle Badd." Kay paused to catch her breath.


"However, Manny Coachen, one of the smuggling ring's members, managed to evade Badd's surveillance and silence the witness. Unfortunately for Coachen, he was caught on a security camera, and so he was put on trial for the murder. In response, the Amano Group sent agents to lure Badd into a trap and steal the surveillance video, and thus Coachen escaped conviction due to the lack of the decisive evidence."


"That's horrible. And they just let him get away scot free?" Kay just nodded once before continuing.


"When Badd and dad heard the verdict and saw Cece Yew's sister Calisto Yew wail in despair, they vowed to take down the smuggling ring by any means necessary. While Yew initially refused their offer to join them, the three later met again, and when each party realized that the other was actively hunting down the smuggling ring, they decided to unite for their singular purpose." Then Kay stopped talking, got up, and walked over to her desk, pulling some things out of one of the drawers before returning once again.


"They knew that the smuggling ring's puppets were sent orders through distinctive black directives cards depicting a white Yatagarasu bird, and thus they thought to parody this by creating a white calling card depicting a black Yatagarasu. Soon enough, the Great Thief Yatagarasu began to grab the attention of the news by stealing evidence of corruption from various companies affiliated with the smuggling ring and exposing it to the media, leaving its calling card to show who had done the deed. While the legend of the Yatagarasu dominated the news for the next three years." You were amazed of all the information you were learning. The life of the Yatagarasu sounded really cool to you.


"Wow. That's so amazing. But how were three people so good at what they did? It seems a little complex to me that only three people could do so much for three long years." That's when Kay showed you the calling card she was talking about a moment ago.


"The three legs of the Yatagarasu represent the thief's three distinct traits. In reality, these three traits come from the particular skills that each of the three people comprising the Yatagarasu brought. First, the Yatagarasu always knows the exact location of the target object. Second, the Yatagarasu knows exactly how to disarm the security systems in the way. As a prosecutor, my father had knowledge of security-disabling methods and used a device called Little Thief to plan the Yatagarasu's heists. Third, the Yatagarasu never leaves a single shred of evidence behind. As the detective in charge of the Yatagarasu cases, uncle Badd could ensure that no evidence ever made it to the authorities. The Yatagarasu always managed to obtain the target undetected, and so the victim company never realized that it had been infiltrated until the evidence and the telltale calling card reached the media and it was too late. Despite the Yatagarasu's best efforts however, the leader of the smuggling ring was never found in all those three years." Kay looked exhausted. She got up and walked into the kitchen for a moment before returning with a glass of water. She drank the whole thing down before continuing her story.


"In 2011, my dad stole a key from the Cohdopian Embassy, but during the same night, an embassy employee named Deid Mann, who was to testify against the embassy, was murdered. Not to mention Kay would have no idea where you would be when she woke up, perhaps it would be better to skip dinner and go straight to bed yourself.

Alright everyone. From here on out I'm going to be working on my own little story for Kay. That's not to say i haven't been doing that thus far, but i just want to make sure no one writes in the chapter path's I'm writing in. Such paths will say they are reserved for me. You can still enter them and read them at your leisure, just don't add to them please.
152211111111131111133.title: Go to bed

choices: Kay decides to show you to her friends
Kay hides you somewhere in her apartment
Kay hides you somewhere on her person
1522111111111311111331.content:
You slowly woke up to the sound of knocking on a far off door. Followed by someone shouting--


"Hey! Kay! Wake up and let us in already!" You could still faintly hear a female voice yelling from afar. Then you heard Kay stirring from her sleep.


"Not now mommy. I'm not ready for school." Kay was really out of it. But sure enough, when she heard that knocking again, she jumped right out of bed in a panic.


"Oh my God! They're here! I'll be right out guys! Just give me a second."


"Just hurry up will you ya? We've been waiting for over an hour out here!" Then Kay started rushing around her room digging stuff out faster than you could keep up with.


"Hey Kay! What's going on?" Kay immediately froze in her tracks and looked down at you like she had seen a ghost. Even though she never said a word, you could tell what she was thinking.


"What am i going to do with you now that they're here?"
1522111111111311111331.title: You woke up to the sound of knocking. (Reserved...

15221111111113111113311.content:
Kay looked around fearful for a moment, but soon came to her senses and got down in front of the dollhouse to pick you up.


"Kay? Who's outside?"


"The other two members of my team. The Yatagarasu has three legs for a reason, remember?" You nodded when you remembered Kay's story from yesterday.


"So what are you going to do with me? Are you going to hide me from them?" Kay shook her head before saying--


"No. I was thinking about it at first, but I'd rather you meet them yourself. That way we don't have to do it later. Alright?"


"Alright Kay. If you're sure, then i trust you." You were still a little unsure about meeting the other members of the Yatagarasu, but you knew Kay would make sure nothing bad happened to you, so you trusted her judgement as she walked outside her bedroom, through the kitchen, and over to the hallway door. Then she took a deep breath before opening the door. And on the other side was--
15221111111113111113311.title: Kay decides to show you to her friends. (Reserved)

152211111111131111133111.content:
When the door opened, you were greeted with the sight of two more women who looked around the same age as Kay. If not a little older. One of them was wearing a white lab coat with a dark green colored button up shirt, brown pants with the legs folded up just below her knees, and a black belt around her pants. She also had on a pair of black high heeled shoes with a small ribbon affixed to them that was tied above her ankles. She also sported a pink ribbon tied around her neck, and was carrying a purse of the same color which was filled to the brim with bottles of stuff you couldn't see from where you were now. She had pink shades over her forehead, her eye color was teal, her hair color was brown, she looked to be around five feet tall, and her skin color was white.


As for the other woman, she was wearing a dark colored shirt which was having a hard time concealing black bra and massive breasts. At least to you they were massive. She was also wearing a short skirt of the same color, and a pair of white slip on high heeled shoes with a black heel. She had long yellow scarf around her neck with a purple magatama hanging just underneath it, as well as small purple earrings in her ears. Both her eye and hair color was brown, she stood in at around five and a half, and her skin color was also white.


"Took ya long enough Kay. Did you forget we were coming over today?"


"No! Of course not. Something happened to me a few day ago that i just had to take care of." Then Kay lifted up her hands to show you off to the others.


"What are you talk...Kay, is that a bug in your hands?"


"I can't say for sure Ema, but it looks more like a tiny doll to me."


"A doll? Kay, aren't you a little old to be playing with dolls?"


"He's not a bug or a doll. He's a person. A really tiny person. Go on, tell em little guy."


"A tiny person? Kay, there's no such thing as a tiny--" Finally you had had enough. you were fed up with everyone calling you some other form of tiny. So you shouted at the your of your lungs--


"Will everyone please stop calling me tiny!" This got everyone's attention. Including Kay's. Then the other two girls started looking at you even more curiously than before.


"Wait, did that thing just talk?"


"I'm not a thing! I'm a human being. And yes! I can talk!" This caused both of the other girls to jump back a few feet. Never in their lives have they ever seen a tiny man before. Of course, neither did Kay until just a few days ago. After a moment or two however, both girls came in real close to examine you. Now you were starting to panic a little. Their eyes were less than a few inches away from you, almost piercing small holes into your body as they examined you very closely. But that was cut short as Kay lifted you up and away from them, causing them both to fall face first onto the floor.


"Ow. Why did you do that Kay? We were just looking at him."


"You were scaring him. He doesn't like it when people look at him like that. Isn't that right little--" You coughed a few times to let her know of her almost error.


"Oh right. Sorry. We still need to figure out a name for you, don't we?" You nodded as both of the other girls got back up.


"Wait Kay, you mean that he doesn't have a name?" Kay turned around to face her friends once again.


"No. He's suffering from amnesia it seems. He doesn't remember anything about himself. And to top it all off, his size is..." Kay trailed off knowing that you didn't want to be called little anymore.


"That's so horrible. I'm sorry for treating you the way i did back there."


"Y-yeah. Me too." Bot of them said as they bowed their heads.


"No guys. It's fine. Really. I'm just glad you understand my situation now."


"Right. Oh, before we forget, we haven't introduced ourselves. My name is Mia Fay. But you can call me Mia."


"And my name is Ema Skye. But just call me Ema."
152211111111131111133111.title: Ema Skye and Mia Fey. (Reserved)

choices: Kay return's quickly with an extra chair. (Reserved).
1522111111111311111331111.content:
After introductions, the four of you went back to the bedroom where Kay set you down on her bed.


"I'll be right back. Just gotta grab an extra chair." Then Kay left you in the room with Mia and Ema.

choices: You agree to help them bypass the door
You refuse, and are excluded from the meeting
You try to think of another way in
15221111111113111113311111.content:
While you were alone in the room with Mia and Ema, Ema was shifting through her purse while taking quick glances at you. Mia was just leaning against the far wall looking at you every now and again as well. And you were starting to panic again, wondering what those two were thinking about. You knew it was about you, but what could they each be thinking about?


"Sorry about that." Kay said as she brought in an extra chair for her friends to sit in. She pulled the other one out from her desk and let Mia and Ema sit down in them. Then Kay proceeded to sit down on her bed facing the others while placing you on her lap. The sudden rush of being placed there and being placed there made you blush.


"So, is everyone ready to start the meeting?" Ema quickly raised her hand.


"Yes Ema? Did you have a question?"


"I did. I was wondering what he was doing here? I thought you said that the Yatagarasu had only three legs."


"Ah, well, you see..." Kay stumbled over her words for a moment before Mia interrupted.


"Kay, does he even know what the Yatagarasu is?"


"Yes. I told him yesterday. He knows."


"So then he knows what we're planing to do tomorrow, right?"


"Um...well, no. I forgot to tell him that part." Mia just sighed as she shook her head.


"Kay, if he has no idea what we're about to do, then i don't think it's a good idea for him to be included in this meeting." Kay just looked down at you saddened.


"Unless of course...you plan on making him a member of the Yatagarasu?" Kay quickly looked back up at Mia in shock.


"Hold on a second Mia, the Yatyagarasu only has three legs, thus it only has three members. It can't have another member, or it'd be a four legged bird. And don't think there's such a thing as that at all." Ema said in argument.


"Well to be fair Ema, there's no such thing as a three legged bird either. But yet, here we are." Then Mia sighed once again.


"But you're right. The Yatagarasu can't have four legs. But who said anything about it not having a tail or a head? Something like that would still work, wouldn't it?"


"Well yeah, but--"


"Or perhaps, we could use him as our secret weapon for tomorrow night's mission."


"What do you mean, our secret weapon?" Kay asked as she didn't like where Mia was going with this.


"Remember when you showed us Little Thief last week? Remember that one room we couldn't get past no matter how hard we tried? The one with the small hole at the base of the final doorway?" Kay pondered Mia's words for a moment before she snapped her fingers.


"Oh, you mean that door?" Then Kay pulled a small device out of her pocket. Then she started pressing some buttons until it started glowing green. And soon after, the whole room was engulfed in the same green light. It blinded you for a while, until you saw the light fade. But when you were able to see once again, you saw that the whole room became something completely different.


"What the?! Kay! What happened to your room?!"


"Like it? This is the Yatagarasu's ultimate weapon. I present to you, Little Thief. With this, i can recreate any environment by the press of a few buttons. In addition, i can also the use data of the places the Yatagarasu plans to steal from. And from that data, we can find out where all the security devices are, how many checkpoints are in each sector, how many guards are in the building, etc." You were amazed once again. You had no idea Kay had such an awesome device. Now it was a no brainier Kay's father was so good at being the Yatagarasu.


"It was right around here if i recall correctly." Mia said as she got up and pointed at the green double doorway. There were also two guards with guns stationed at either side of the door. As well as card scanners next to both guards. Kay then zoomed in on one of the guards feet. And behind them, was a small hole about two inches tall that seemed to go through to the other side of the doors.


"If we had something small enough to fit through there, then we wouldn't need to resort to combat. We could just have that thing go in there and retrieve the target for us." Then Mia looked over at you. Followed by Ema, and Kay.


"Wait. Let me get this straight. You want me, someone who's never had any experience in stealing anything, sneak into a heavily secured building with armed guards and steal something without being spotted?"


"Exactly. If we think about it logically, then someone of your...stature, would be the perfect choice to send in there. You'd be small enough so that the only way you'd be spotted is if someone was looking right at you on the floor. Plus, you're the only thing we have that's small enough to get past that door." You started thinking through Mia's words. Then she smiled a wicked smile and said--


"However, if you don't want to do it, that's fine. It just mean's we'll have to kill those pesky guards and steal their card keys." Everyone looked up at Mia in shock.


"Mia! you're not actuality thinking about killing those guards are you? They may be working for the bad guys, but that doesn't mean they're bad as well." Kay said in argument. Then Mia brushed her hair aside as she said--


"Well what would you do Kay? Those guards are packing enough heat to gun us down before we even make it five feet in front of them. There's no other way to get to that door unless we kill them first, unless he uses that small hole to bypass the guards, the door, and the security system." While you were afraid of sneaking into such a place, you also didn't like Mia's other idea. It was either you go in with them, or stay behind and pray to God that they find another way that doesn't involve killing those guards.
15221111111113111113311111.title: Kay return's quickly with an extra chair. (...

152211111111131111133111111.content:
While you had no idea what you would be put up against, nor did you have any training in this field, you needed to do this. It was either that or let Mia kill those pesky guards.


"Alright. I'll do it." You said with a somewhat convincing tone of voice. Mia smiled and Ema fist pumped, while Kay brought you up to her face looking at you with a look of concern.


"Listen to me little guy, you don't have to do this if you don't want to. We'll find another way. Just trust me on this." You shook your head and said--


"No Kay. I'm sure i want to do this. It's the least i can do after everything you've done for me so far. So please let me do this." Kay looked worried for a moment, but sighed and said--


"Alright. But i don't want to take any chances. If you don't think you can handle yourself once you're in there, i want you to pull out and let us take care of the rest. Alright?" You nodded as Mia spoke up.


"Well now that that's out of the way, let's go over the details for our, 'Little Thief' now." The three of them started laughing at the name, But Kay stopped once she saw you looking up at her again.


"Oops. Sorry. I keep forgetting to stop calling you--" But then you interrupted her by saying--


"Little Thief huh? You know what? I kinda like the sound of that."


"Huh? What do you mean?" Kay said with a confused look on her face.


"Think about it. I'm a new member of a group of thieves, and I'm tiny enough to be called a little thief. It's a perfect name for me until i remember my real one."


"True, i guess. But what about my device called Little Thief? What are we going to call it if we call you Little Thief?" Then Ema started talking.


"What about Little Thief mk 2? Since it would be silly to call him mk 2, we could just call him the first real life Little Thief." Kay thought about it for a moment before deciding--


"Alright. If everyone else want's to go with it, then sure. Little guy, you are hereby given the title of, Little Thief."
152211111111131111133111111.title: The Yatagarasu's Secret Weapon: The Little Thief

choices: Kay let's you and Ema go alone
Kay decides to go with you and Ema
Kay wants Mia to go with you and Ema
1522111111111311111331111111.content:
"Alright, With all that taken care of, let's do one final meeting to help Little Thief understand our plan of attack." Mia said as she pulled out a blueprint of the whole building and laid it out on the floor for everyone to look at.


"Our target is called Sophomore Labs. And recently, thanks to Ema, we were able to hack into the mainframe for a short period of time. Just long enough for us to catch glimpses of plans for a device that can rewrite the biometric data of any person who uses it. Basically, enabling the user to get past any biometric security system, such as fingerprint identification software, blood analysis, retinal scanners, and even voice recognition software." Mia said as she looked down at you.


"Wow. I never knew such a thing ever existed."


"Nether did we, until we got tipped of by an email that got sent to Ema by mistake, saying that the prototype had been finished and they were ready for testing, and needed it to be used on a low security area, such as the home of a non-wealthy person who has some kind of security in their home that they could hack into. When she saw that message, she looked into it and found the plans and brought them to us." Kay said as she looked down at you and back at the others.


"That thing, whatever it's called, is too powerful to be held in the hands of humans. If the person using it was intending to use it for evil purposes, they could hack into banks and steal money form anywhere in the world, steal other people's identity's, security cards used to get into classified areas, and so many other things. It needs to be stopped and shown to the police before they can mass produce them and take over the world." Even you had to agree with Mia on that point. That thing was far too powerful for any human being to possess.


"Alright, so it's powerful and we need to show the whole world what they've made so they can be stopped. How are we going to do that?" You asked as Ema got down on her hands and knees and started showing you the floor plans.


"The prototype device is located on the 67th floor, on the east side of the building. They've got it locked up in that room we showed you before. on the other side of those doors is a room with laser sensors and security cameras. Pass through the lasers, and game over. The whole room locks up until the guards unlock them themselves. Same with the cameras. Don't let them see you, or else." After catching her breath, Ema continued.


"There's still the matter of the final door however. It's keypad locked. The good news is that we know the code. The bad news is, you won't be able to reach it."


"So, what do i do if i can't reach it?"


"Well, i was just thinking, perhaps i could create some devices for you to use before we send you inside tomorrow night. You'll need to have some sort of spy gear if you want to take being a member of the Yatagarasu seriously." Ema said as she started poking her chin with her index finger before continuing.


"Anyway, after that last door, the last room with the device has a floor that's rigged with a sensor that goes off if there's more weight on it than what's already inside. You might be able to avoid it, but why leave anything up to chance? I could create something for you to use while i create some other things for you to use." You liked the idea of having your own custom made spy gear that you alone could use. It made you feel more...unique that way.


"Alright then, i guess we'll just have to wait on you to create my gear for the mission, right Ema?" Ema nodded as she got up and walked on over to you and Kay.


"Right. So I'll head on over to my lab and get to work on that. I guess that means you'll be coming along with me Little Thief." Ema said as she reached out for you, only for Kay to cover you with her other hand.


"Go with you? Why does he need to go with you Ema?" Kay asked in a worried tone of voice.


"Well how else am i going to get proper measurements for his gear? Make repeated trips back and forth to see if everything works and fits? No, it would be so much easier on me and my feet if he came with me." Ema says as she shifts her feet around, making you glance down at them for a moment.


"Don't worry Kay, I'll make sure to bring him back in one piece, safe and sound. So don't worry about it." Kay looked down at you, still unsure of weather or not she should let you go alone with her alone, or let someone else go along with you two.
1522111111111311111331111111.title: Planing the attack

choices: Driver seat. Ema wants Kay to drive while Ema holds onto you in the back seat
15221111111113111113311111112.content:
"Alright. But i want to go with you as well." Kay said as Ema looked at Kay a little shocked.


"What? Why? Don't you trust me Kay?" Ema said as she had a confused look on her face.


"I do trust you Ema, it's just...i want him to stay close to me whenever he can." That comment caught everyone in the room (except Kay) off guard. Even you could only imagine what she meant by that comment. And that's when Ema started grinning at Kay before saying...


"Oh, i see how it is. So you've already claimed him for yourself have you Kay?" Kay started blushing like a Californian wildfire at Ema's comment as she she shock her head madly before shouting...


"What?! No! It's nothing like that Ema. He came to me looking for help when he needed it the most. That mean's i have to be the one to take care of him." Ema still didn't believe Kay, and honestly, neither did you or Mia. Everyone else in the room wasn't buying her story for a second. But you were happy she cared for you that much. It made you feel safe being close to her.


"Whatever, i still say you're in love with him, but that's just me."


"Whatever, can we please just go now?" Kay said upset as she squeezed her hands around your body a little. It wasn't enough to crush you, but you were in a little bit of pain.


"Sure thing Kay. Mia, what will you do while we're gone?"


"Guess I'll go see how Wright's is doing. God knows he can't do a damn thing in court without my help." Mia said as she follow behind the rest of us. And soon we were outside. It was still daylight out, looked like noon with the sun all the way up in the sky. There were other people outside as well, but Key kept you hidden as she and Ema made their way to Ema's car, while Mia did the same for her own car.


Now for the next question. Which seat did Key sit down in?

When you got inside...

15221111111113111113311111112212.content:
You enter Ema's lab without hassle, though Kay had to hide you in her hands when other people were passing by. When she uncovered them however, you were inside Ema's lab. It was very...lab like. It had all the things you were expecting and more.


"Well, here we are. Home sweet home." Ema said as she plopped down on her rotating chair.


"Wait, so you live here Ema?" You asked wondering if she was joking or not.


"Pretty much. I'm almost always in here doing research on pretty much anything i can get my hands on." Then Ema gave you a light smile as she said...


"Though i wouldn't mind doing some research on you." You gulped at her comment, wondering what she meant by that.


"Ema! why would you say something like that to him? He's still a person, you shouldn't treat him like a lab rat." Kay said as she started raising her voice, while Ema started shaking her hands saying...


"Sorry sorry. You're right Kay, I'm sorry Little Thief. I didn't mean to scare you by saying that. I just wanted to see if there were any changes in your body and how it acts since you're so small, that's all." You could understand Ema's curiosity, though you felt like moving onto creating your spy gear and getting ready for tomorrow night.


"Right then, let's see here. What should we create for you first?"

And you almost ran over three people when you drove right past the police station. How you weren't arrested, or even pulled over for that matter, is still beyond me." Mia said as she headed out the door along with Ema, leaving Kay to nod and look at the floor with a depressed look on her face as Mia closed the door behind her. Ema held you in her hand for a while as they came to her car. It was small, white, and had mud stains along the lower edges, proving she didn't know how to stay on the road. Or the fact she loved driving on the dirt trail. Either way, Ema opened the door as Mia got in the back driver side seat while Ema sat down in the driver seat and said...

152211111111132.content:
After much mental debate, you decided in the end that you would try to sneak a peek at Kay while she was changing. Quickly you got up and hurried over to the cracked-open door. You gulped nervously as you stood before the entrance to Kay's personal bathroom. With a bit of hesitation, you walked through the door and looked forward.

You expected to see Kay changing out of her pajamas and into her usual outfit, completely oblivious to your presence. What you saw was Kay, still in her pajamas, standing over you with her hands on her hips. Her expression was completely unreadable, but it was obvious that she was waiting for you. Before you even had time to react, Kay reached down and grabbed you off the floor, her slender fingers wrapping around your tiny body and lifting you up into the air.

"Um... H-hi Kay..." You said, a nervous smile on her face as you tried to play this off.

"Hello there, mister mini-man. I see that you thought you could sneak a peek at me changing without me noticing. You clearly aren't that bright if you thought I'd just conveniently forget to close the door all the way, and that it being cracked open just enough for a tiny little man who happens to be sharing a room with me to slip through was just a coincidence." Kay said, not even the tone of her voice giving you a hint as to how she was feeling right now. Apparently this girl had an incredible poker face and the ability to hide her emotions when talking.

Mentally you slapped yourself for falling into such an obvious trap. You should have just sat back and ate that bread that she left for you, but nooo. You just had to let your arousal get the better of you. You were sure that Kay was furious with you now.

"This was a test, little guy. And guess what: You..."
152211111111132.title: Kay's test

choices: In the doll house by yourself.
1522111111111321.content:
"This was a test, little guy. And guess what: You pass!" Kay said, her expressionless face quickly shifting to a very proud smile.

For a second you cringed. You were sure that Kay was going to yell at you for being a perv, so you instinctively reacted accordingly once she spoke. Then the words that had actually come out of her mouth hit you, and you were left incredibly confused.

"I... I passed? What? How?" You asked, having no idea what was going on anymore.

Kay couldn't help but giggle at your confusion.

"Yeah, you passed my test little guy. I wanted to see just how much you liked me, and considering that you were willing to risk getting caught and punished just to try and sneak a peek at me while I was changing, you must like me quite a bit." Kay said, a playful grin on her face.

Immediately you began to blush. She was right. Even though you had only just met her, you were really starting to like Kay a lot.

Seeing your face turn bright red like that, Kay began to laugh.

"Awwww, you're so cute little guy! Okay, since you wanted to see it sooo much, I'll be nice and give you the show that you came here to see." Kay said, grinning mischievously.

Kay then set you down next to the sink. Your mind was struggling to wrap itself around what you had just heard. Was Kay really going to do what she was implying?

You got your answer as Kay winked seductively at you and began slowly stripping off her clothes one piece at a time. With each piece she removed, your face turned more and more red. Soon she was standing before you in all her naked glory, and you practically fainted from the intense arousal.

Once again Kay shot you a teasing look before snapping her fingers to bring you back to reality.

"Okay pipsqueak, show's over. Let's get to bed now before you explode all over my counter." Kay said, quickly slipping on her pajama's and scooping you up once again.

"K-Kay... What was... Did you really just... Am I dreaming?"

Kay simply giggled and ruffled up your hair with her index finger.

"Nope, that really just happened little guy. Consider it your reward for passing my test."

Kay then crawled into her bed and placed you on top of her chest.

"And I've got one more present for you. If you want, I'll let you sleep with me tonight. Of course, if that's too much for you, you can always just sleep in the doll house. The choice is yours, little guy. What do you want to do?" Kay asked.


Where do you decide to sleep?

"Shocked, huh? I guess I would be too if I woke up only a few inches tall. Unless you've always been this way, then that makes your discovery even more incredible! By the way, I'm Ema, Ema Skye, and you're going to make me famous among the scientific community!" Ema squealed to herself. But you could barely understand what was even going on in her flurry of words!

So you shrunk, and she found you? This is way too weird.

But wait, pink tinted glasses, lab coat, an endearing love for science, she must be Ema Skye from the Ace Attorney series! (that and she did say her name was Ema Skye)

Looking at her attire and mid 20's appearance, you must specifically be in Apollo Justice! But how did you end up shrunken in your video game?

The room itself was a big of a mess. Scattered clothing and scientific equipment lined the floors and desktops, making you quite glad that you had Ema to carry you over it all. You didn't imagine you chances would be too promising trying to navigate down there alone.

choices: You use the break to discuss your situation
Ema wants to play around with you a bit during the break
15531222211.content:
You weren't certain you liked the sound of that. Sure, the first test hadn't hurt, but you still had no idea what the limits of your tiny body really were.
Ema looked thoughtful for a few seconds.

"I've got it!" she said, setting her notepad down. "Since we know that your base molecular structure has been condensed and fortified in proportion to your size, we should see if the same applies to your muscle mass!"

"... What?" you asked. Only about half of the words that you just heard made any sense to you, and they weren't the important ones.
Ema sighed impatiently. Without answering, she lifted you off the chair and moved you over to the table. Then, she turned her pencil over in her hand and set the eraser down on the tabletop in front of you.

"See if you can climb up this pencil." she instructed. "This'll let me test your muscle mass and stamina."
It didn't seem worth arguing. You looked the pencil over. It was slightly worn out, but it didn't look as if there were really any places to take a grip on it. Even so, you placed your hands on the metallic eraser casing and pulled your feet onto one of the small ridges. At this point, you encountered two problems. Firstly, there definitely weren't any dents in the wood of the pencil that were large enough for you to hold onto, and secondly, Ema's hand wasn't perfectly steady, which meant that the pencil was swaying slightly on the spot. After a few seconds of running your hands over the pencil in search of any handholds, you decided to try just putting your arms around the entire thing to inch your way up. This worked for all of five seconds before you inevitably slipped from the smooth surface. Ema frowned as you fell back down onto the tabletop.
"You alright?" she asked, leaning closer.

"Yeah..." you muttered, getting to your feet.

"Hmm... I guess there isn't any good way to grip onto the pencil, then..." she said, thinking it over. After a moment, she smiled. "New plan."
Setting the pencil aside, she turned around and sat down on the surface of the table herself. You watched as she extended her index finger and set her fingertip on the table, right in front of you.
"OK. Try climbing up my arm, instead."
You looked up toward Ema's shoulder, high above you. Her arm was pointing fairly straight downward, but it looked like her sleeve would be easy to hold on to, once you could get to it.

You took a step forward, right in front of Ema's fingernail. Up close, you could tell that her index finger alone was thicker than your whole body. It would have been intimidating, if not for the first test she had tried. Not wasting any time, you grabbed the best hold you could around her finger and began to pull yourself upward. Her skin was smooth, but not even close to how smooth the pencil had been. As such, it wasn't too hard to make it up to her hand and the base of her arm. Ema was watching your movements closely, probably trying to check for any signs of exhaustion, considering what she had said about your stamina. Once you started up her wrist, the climb slowed down a bit, but you still weren't finding it very difficult. After around half a minute, you reached her elbow, where the sleeve of her green shirt started. The fabric was much easier to hold onto, and in less than half the time that the first part of the climb had taken, you pulled yourself up onto her shoulder.

"Good work! You don't even look tired!" she said as you pushed away a lock of her hang that had swayed against you. She quickly wrote a few notes on her notepad again. "OK. You're doing well so far, so let's take a break."

15533212.content:
Everything seemed dark as you woke up from fainting over something earlier. You tried to remember what happened but nothing came to mind. You had amnesia and everything was dark. You tried to find out where you were by searching around. You found a wall but it was dome shaped. Were you in a cage? You saw a little spot of light and figured out you could lift the wall and get out of this prison. You used all of your strength.to lift the wall. It was tiring but you managed to escape and find out your surroundings. It was some kind of restaurant. Everything was so PINk and BIG. What kind of restaurant is this? You suddenly realise that this is Tres Bien from Ace Attorney: Trials and Tribulations. But why was it so big?.................. Wait a minute. You see a giant teacup set upside down next to you and you were on a saucer. You shrunk to a small size! You started to sweat and panic. 'What's going to happen to you?' you thought. Just then you heard loud footsteps and a woman wearing an orange maid's outfit with an apron. She had black hair and was relaxing on a chair next to the table where you were situated/

"Ah! No customers at the moment. I can relax with my own drink" She said as she placed a filled cup of tea on the table near you.

" Isn't that....... Maggey Byrde? You spoke very softly. It appears she is on a short break. You wondered what to do when she spoke.

"Huh? Did someone call my name? I don't see any customers?" She said with a confused tone.

"Uh oh" You said. You didn't think she would hear you. You hid back inside the cup you were in earlier. You were breathing heavily and thinking of how to get back to normal when the cup was lifted up and you saw Maggey looking right down at you.

'Oh my' You thought. What was she going to say?

" Uh...well, I can't remember what happened to me and I don't know my name. Do you know what I should do?" You asked but remained nervous.

15533221.title: Adrian Andrews

choices: Hide in one of her socks
155332212.content:
"What happened?" You muttered as you opened your eyes slowly. It took a few moments for your vision to adjust, but when it did, you were convinced that you were still dreaming.


"Is that...how is...everything is so big?" You stuttered. Indeed, everything around you looked like the contents of someone's bedroom. A girl's probably. Judging by the collection of stuffed animals arranged nicely in rows based on the size of the animals. You tried pinching yourself and even punching yourself a few times to wake yourself up from this bizarre dream. But you didn't wake up.


"Is this actually real?" You asked yourself. Before you could ponder more on that thought, a strange odor filled your nostrils. Turning around, you saw a MASSIVE pair of black high heels towering above you like buildings. Much to your relief, the heels had no wearer at the moment. Though the thought of something large enough to wear them provided you with a painful reminder of how helpless you must be right now. Resting off to the side of the heels were a larger pair of black socks. This was the source of the smell from earlier. You looked around the room, trying to understand your surroundings. The rest of the room layout seemed normal for a bedroom. It had a bed, a wardrobe, closet, side table with a lamp and some books on it, a desk with a computer, and two doors. One of which was partially open. Just then, the ground started to shake. The vibrations grew more and more powerful until you heard something trying to open the closed door. The door opened and in walked a titanic woman with golden hair that was held in a ponytail. Which looked like it would go down to around her neck if it wasn't. She had thin, basic glasses over her eyes. Her attire consisted of a black, shoulder-less top and black pants with a gray belt. She was currently walking around barefoot, and had a nervous look on her face, and seemed to be sweating a lot. As well as playing with something in her hands.


"Wait a second...isn't she?-" Then it hit you like a ton of bricks. This woman was none other than Adrian Andrews. A woman who appeared in JFA, and T&T. Part of you wanted to ask her for help, but you didn't know if you could trust this her. You'd have no way to save yourself if she decided to keep you as a pet or a toy. For now, hiding was your best option. At least until you had a better understanding of how she acts around others.
155332212.title: Much more at ease - cheerful, even excitable

1553322122.content: As soon as Adrian walked into the room, you knew you had to hide from her. There was no telling if she would hurt you if she found you or not. Or if she would even notice you for that matter. You took a quick look around and saw the bed nearby. {About 50 feet at your height.} and made a run for it. You didn't look back. You were to scared to see if she saw you or not. By the time you made it to one of the legs of the bed however, you got behind it and took a quick breather. After you caught your breath, you poked your head out from behind the bed leg to see Adrian still standing where she entered from. Still with that worried look on her face. Still sweating up a storm. And still playing with whatever was in her hands. That's when she opened her mouth at last and started talking about-
1553322122.title: Hide under her bed

choices: Climb her bed, and try to talk to her.
15533221221.content:
Adrian finally opened her mouth and started talking about something. But when she did, you almost wished she didn't.


"Oh-my-God-Oh-my-God-Oh-my-God-Oh-my-God-Oh-my-God-Oh-my-God-Oh-my-God-O h-my-God-Oh-my-God!" She was repeating herself over and over. She looked like she was about to go into shock. She was also hyperventilating. She was also pacing back and forth from the door to the bed over and over again as well. Whatever had her upset must really have a strong grip on her.


"I can't believe this is happening. I didn't know it would do that. I didn't know a child's plaything could do something like that. OH MY GOD! I'M SUCH AN IDIOT!!!" Adrian started hitting herself on the side of her head as well as biting the tip of her tong. She seemed upset over a toy? Of all things?


"I didn't know it would do that. How could I know that a little game like that could pull a person out of their own world? HOW COULD I KNOW?!" She started hitting herself again. But something struck me as odd. She said something about a game that could pull people into another world? Why did that sound so-


"Wait a second. Where is he? I thought I put him next to my shoes-WHY ISN'T HE HERE?! Did I step on him?!" Adrian then starts checking the bottom of her feet for signs a bloody mess that could have been you. But when she saw her feet were clean of anything {Except the sweat from being worried so much.} She started to calm down a little. {Just a little. You could barely notice it.}


"Okay. So he's not under my feet. That mean's he's still somewhere in my room." Adrian then takes a quick look around her room for signs of the tiny life that is you.


"Hello? Are you still in here?" Adrian then took a took a few steps towards the bed.


"Please, don't be afraid of me. I just want to help you. So please come out. Just to show me you aren't dead. Please?" She stopped with her feet just inches away from the leg of the bed you were at.


"This girl worry's to much." You told yourself as you held your nose. The smell from her feet alone was enough to make you sick. It was almost like, whenever she gets upset, her whole body starts to stink up. And Adrian must have noticed it as well. Because when she brought her hand up to her chin to ponder where you might be, her face turned to disgust. She then smelled the rest of her arm's, then underarm's.


"Oh God that's nasty. I really need to stop sweating like this. It always makes me smell bad. Guess I'd better put that stuff on again." Adrian then starts to walk away from the bed. Still looking at the floor, making sure she doesn't step on you. She then walks out the door she came in from and closes in shut. So now she's gone. But not for long. But was that such a bad thing? She really sounds like she wants to take care of you. But at the same time, you know how much of a klutz she can be. Like that time in T&T, case three, when she dropped the vase that had the letters I AM on the front, and she even rearranged them to spell AMI as it said in JFA. But still, she was the one clumsy enough to drop it in the pink paint in the first place. If she could do that to a priceless vase, how in the world could she handle a tiny person who has no idea where he is anymore? As you were thinking about what to do, Adrian walked back into the room again.


"Ahh. Much better." She then walked carefully back to her bed and sat down on it with her feet right next to you. You didn't dare smell them again. But something looked different about them. It looked like they had a shine to them. And it looked like they were smoother then before. That's when you decided to give them a quick sniff. So you got right next to them, sniffed them, then pulled back, covering you nose. But when you did, you wanted to smell them again. Something was different about them. They smelled...nicer. So you let go of your nose and sniffed them once more. They still smelled sort of like sweat. But not as bad. They also smelled like cherry blossoms. It wasn't a strong scent, but it wasn't a bad one either. It was...perfect. Just then, while you were caught up in thought, her heel came back and knocked you into the bed leg. It didn't really hurt, it just caught you by surprise. Then it went up onto the bed. You heard some rustling on the bed above you. Like she was getting ready to go to bed.


"Well, I'm going to take a quick nap. Make yourself at home. Just please don't leave the room. It's really dangerous out there for someone so small like you." You heard her covering herself up under her blankets.


"And one more thing, please don't come up here while I'm sleeping. I tend to attack my bedding in my sleep. Always dreaming about all the times I've screwed up In my life." And then she stopped talking and started sleeping. This looked like the perfect time to get a better understanding of your situation. You could have a look around her room. Or you could try to climb up her bed and get in contact with her. But she said that she tends to attack her bed in her sleep. No doubt over the events that happened in JFA. Or you could try to leave the room and go explore somewhere else. But that sounds more dangerous than the other two options. If you left her room, She would still think you were in there. And she might act even more klutzy than normal outside. In the end, you decided to-

She'd probably just tell you to get lost and never come back, leaving you to care for yourself in a world where no one knows you even exist. But your urges were strong. 15533221221111222.title: I heard about it elsewhere.

155332212211112221.content:
"I remembered hearing about you from the Matt Engarde case. It was a really big case at the time. With that Shelly de Killer guy, and the defense attorney's assistant being kidnapped to force him to get Matt acquitted. It was truly an amazing-"


"You're lying." Her hand formed a fist before you could finish. Her face was now one of anger.


"Hey! What do you mean I'm lying?! I'm telling you the truth, I swear!"


"You're not telling me anything but what you want to tell me. I know you're not from around here. Or even from this world for that matter." She started applying more presser on your body. You could feel you bones start to crack. You didn't know if she wanted to hurt you or not from the way she was treating you earlier, but from the looks of it, she didn't seem to care anymore.


"What do you mean I'm not form this world?! Was it you who did this to me?!" She started looking at you with a more sinister look then you've ever seen before.


"Ha. Maybe I did, And maybe I didn't. It's doesn't really matter anyway."


"What are you talking about?! What are you going to do to me?!"


"As I said, it doesn't really matter anymore. I've been screwed over by so many men in the past before, I just tend to stay away from them. But I don't care who they are. How big the are, or how small they are either. If a man ever does something to hurt me, or if they look me in the eye and LIE to me!" She really applied some serous force on your body when she yelled at you. You swore as you felt you legs snap under the presser, as well as a few ribs.


"I don't care who they think they are. They. Will. Pay." You could tell that if you didn't do something soon, she would do more than just brake you body parts. You had to quickly convince her to spare your life. Somehow.
155332212211112221.title: I remember you from the Matt Engarde case.

1553322122111122211.content:
You were running out of time. You had to find some way to stop her from killing you. There must have been something you could use to stop her. Anything you could tell her that would.....wait...there was something. Something you just told her that would convince her to let you go.


"Well, I guess I've had enough of you. I suppose I shouldn't let you suffer like this. So I guess I should-"


Wait! Please, stop." You said weakly.


"Hm? What now? More lies?"


"You said I was lying to you. But it looks to me, like I was telling the truth after all."


"What are you, death? I just told you that you couldn't be from this world. So there's no way for you-"


"And yet I still know about it, don't I?!" Adrian took a step back as you rose your voice to her.


"I may not be from this world. But that doesn't change the fact that I know about the Matt Engarde case. If you claim that I'm a liar, then how could I possibly know about those things?!" Just then, her face turned from one of anger, to one of surprise and confusion. Sure, you weren't from this world, yet you still knew about the the Matt Engarde case. How was that possible? Adrian wondered. Until you spoke up again.


"You want to know how I know all these things? It's because You're from a video game world. This whole world you live in is nothing but pixels, and a predetermined storyline. In short, you don't even, really, exist." It was hard for you to say that last part, but it also had to come out if you were to get out of this ordeal alive. But even then, you didn't know what her next action would be.


"No.....it...can't be. THERE'S JUST NO WAY!" Just then, her grip on you returned, and you could feel some more ribs starting to crack.


"I CAN'T BE THE ONE WHO LIVES IN A VIDEO GAME! I KNOW WHAT I SAW! I SAW YOU COME OUT OF A VIDEO GAME! IT WAS YOU, NOT ME!!!" She was starting to flail around and about. You were starting to get sick. But something she said caught your attention.


"Wait! Calm down Ms Andrews! What do you mean I was the one that came out of a video game?!" This was enough to get her to stop tossing you around like a rag-doll. But her face had tears running down it like a river.


"I found a small handheld game, in a trashcan on the side of the street. I thought someone had left it there by mistake. So I came back home to keep it in a safe place, and called the police about lost and found. They told me to hold onto it, and that they would get back to me in a little while. Then I got bored waiting for them to call me back, so I decided to play with it for a little bit. That's when I saw you in the game. It looked like you were playing with a device almost exactly like the one I was using. And then, there was a bright flash of light coming from your device. And then there was an even brighter one coming from the one I was holding. And the next thin I knew, you were laying on the screen. Unconscious." Everything she just told you was a different story than you were hoping to hear. From the way she said it, the one who was living in a video game world-
1553322122111122211.title: When you were telling her about the Matt Engard...

choices: You're still alive. But you black out, and don't wake up for quite some time.
You die there. {Make it a good ending.}
15533221221111222111.content:
The way she said everything so far sounded almost like you were the one who came out of a video game. But how could that be? You could swear you felt alive before you came into this world. But then, was it any different for Adrian?


"Adrian...this game you're talking about...what's it about?" You said weakly. Adrian still had her grip on you. But at the time, you nor Adrian didn't seem to care about that. You saw her reach into her desk and pull out what looked like a 3DS. In fact, it was a 3DS.


"I don't know. All I know is that you were in the game when I turned it on. And after a little while, you started playing a game on a system almost like it. I think it was called Ace Attorney: Justice For All. And when you turned it on, I saw Mr. Wright on it. As well as his assistant Maya Fay. The game looked really in depth about everything that happened from when that man attacked him in the lobby, all the way to the incident at the Watergate hotel. 155332222222222222222222222222222212.content:
Ow, jeeze my head hurts... you thought as you slowly sat up from what was probably the most uncomfortable sleep you could remember.

You looked at what the horribly uncomfortable thing that you slept on was. It was...a shiny black material. It felt like a hard plastic shell of some sort. And boy was it freakin' cold! In fact, the whole room around you felt like the inside of a freezer!

You take a look around to find yourself in a huge room covered with snow and giant icicles hanging from a large fireplace! It also seemed the thing you slept on was elevated a few feet off the ground. Wait, you peer carefully off the edge of your "bed" to see giant piano keys jutting out from the side! You soon realize you're standing on a giant grand-piano! No, wait, you're actually just really tiny in a noraml-sized room with a grand-piano!

You quickly look around to see if there was anyone around who could help you. Your prayers were soon answered as you hear giant footsteps approaching from behind a nearby door. You then realize how difficult this is going to be and look for somewhere to hide to think of a better plan! ...But there's not many places to hide on top of a piano so you just duck down and stare intently at the gigantic figure coming out of the door...

The figure is soon revealed to be a woman! She looked quite young actually, and quite pretty. She was wearing pink oven mitts that completely covered her hands, a large blue overcoat, snow boots, one of those Russian hat things that you could never remember the name to, and an apron.

She had shoulder-length wavy blonde hair and was holding a large silver platter with the lid over it. It looked like she was a waitress! You quickly begin to jump up and down and wave your hands trying to get this girl's attention. As she passes by you...
155332222222222222222222222222222212.title: Quick Fingers Orly

choices: Your captress immediately takes you somewhere to be alone and talk...
You had to endure waiting through the rest of her workday first!
1553322222222222222222222222222222121.content:
Finally right when the girl was about to turn away from you she quickly glanced back for just a moment and saw you trying to get her attention!

She immediately turned to face you and put her free hand (still with the oven mitt on) over her mouth. She then let out a barely audible gasp. She stared at you for a moment, probably trying to tell if you were real or not. You finally decided to help confirm her suspicion and tried to speak in the most clearly heard voice you could muster.

"Um, hello, Miss! Would you mind telling me how I ended up here, or shrunken for that matter? I-If you know anything, that is."

As you waited for a response from her, the girl slowly put down the platter she was holding in her other hand on a nearby table. Once doing so, she stared at you for another moment before quickly snatching you in her mitted grasp! You were sent hurdling up past her large overcoated body towards her face at the speed of a rocket!

It was getting pretty hard to breathe because of how tight her grasp was on you, so you tried to squirm as much as you could to get a little more room, but her hold on you didn't weaken.

You soon reached her face where her brown-eyed stare cut your puny body in half before her. All of the bravery that you had left in you was now lost under her piercing gaze, and it felt like you were even smaller than before.

All you heard was a simple "I can't believe it..." muttered from her lips and, as discreetly as she could, stuffed you into the pocket of her apron and sprinted off with you in tow!

As your giant captress carried you off to some unknown location, you wondered just what would be in store for you next...
1553322222222222222222222222222222121.title: Taken

choices: Olga's workday is finished and she suddenly takes you out of her pocket to talk!
You start to climb Olga to get her attention...
15533222222222222222222222222222221212.content:
This was going to be a long day...

You tried to lay down inside you giantess captress' pocket, but it was no use. The constant running and delivering of orders the waitress was doing was shaking the inside of your pocket-prison too much.

You were constantly being slammed into the girl's thigh with every step she took, and every once in a while you could make out the girl's voice taking orders.

"Hello, Sir and Ma'am. Welome to Borscht Bowl Club. May I take order?" you could hear the girl say in a very squeaky Russian accent.

Although, it's strange, when you heard her briefly say something to you before shoving you in her apron, you could swear she didn't have an accent. Maybe the Russian-ness was just a ploy to go with the theme of the restaurant? Wait, fake Russian accent, Borscht Bowl Club...you've been shrunken in your Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney game! And your giant captress is none other than Olga Olry, the waitress who worked here with Phoenix during his time as a "professional piano player"!

You were quite satisfied with yourself knowing that you figured all of this out own your own (even though it did take a few hints).

But now your problem just got more complicated. How were you gonna get back home? And could you trust Olga? You remembered that she had that secret wild side...

What do you decide?

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
One last question before we begin. Will this be taking place before the events of Turnabout Academy, or after?

If before, then Myriam is still a self-centered jerk who will go to any lengths to come up with a popular scoop, and doesn't care if anyone ends up getting hurt in the process. In this route she would be far more likely to abuse you for her own amusement or exploit you for publicity than actually decide to help you out.

If after, then Myriam has reformed and become friends with Juniper's group. She will be a much nicer person in this route, and thus far more likely to help you out or playfully tease you about your minuscule stature than to actively go out of her way to exploit you in any way.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Myriam Scuttlebutt

choices: Keep you to herself as her own personal servant.
Use you as an advertisement tool to draw new members to her club.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As soon as you woke up, you immediately clutched your head in pain. You had no idea where you were or what had just happened to you. Every time you tried to remember something from your past, a sharp pain flashed through your head. It was as though your memories were being sealed away by some kind of supernatural force.

However, for some reason there was one thing that you could remember perfectly well: your knowledge of the Ace Attorney series. You had no idea why that information alone was still fresh in your mind when everything else seemed to be locked behind an electric fence, but at least it was something. Maybe that knowledge would become useful to you in the near future.

As fate would have it, it very much did.

As you began to look around at your surroundings, the area around you seemed strangely familiar. To your left was a single three story building, and to your right was what appeared to be a storage shed. What immediately caught your attention was how mind-numbingly gigantic these buildings appeared to be compared to you. It was as if you had been shrunken down to a measly 3 inches tall!

Just as this thought entered your head, you heard something moving behind you and quickly turned around to see what it was. You were worried that it would be a giant cat or something that would carry you away and make a quick meal out of you, but much to your relief the only thing there was a brown cardboard box. Under normal circumstances, this box would have been just average sized, but with your current minuscule form it appeared to be the size of a mansion to you.

Said box had a pair of holes in it near the bottom, and the side that was facing you was fairly decorated. There were a couple red warning stickers near the top and a picture of a panda holding a marker in the bottom left corner. You couldn't immediately tell why, but this box also seemed very familiar to you. It was as though you had seen it somewhere before, but that was impossible... Right now your only memories were of the Ace Attorney games, so why would something like this-!

Myriam Scuttlebutt.

This was bad. Myriam Scuttlebutt was an... interesting character. At first she came across as just a mean spirited jerk whose sole purpose was to antagonize others through her slanderous school newspaper, but she later reformed and became a much nicer person, even befriending the three people she had antagonized the most. Though she constantly hid within a cardboard box, underneath it she was actually kinda cute.

As you hoped that this Myriam was the post-reform version, you knew that the box she was wearing indicated otherwise. She had a much different box on after her character reform happened, so the fact that she was wearing this one meant that you were in deep trouble. As soon as you realized this and began to run away, however, a giant hand shot out of one of the holes in the box and grabbed you tight. You squirmed and struggled as much as you could against those gigantic fingers, but it was useless. She had caught you.

As soon as she had you in her hand, the box lifted up off the ground to reveal the lower body of the young schoolgirl who had been hiding underneath it. Her legs were long and slender, with her uniform's skirt just covering her upper thighs. She had pads covering her knees, and she had a single bandaid on each leg. Though her body from the waist up was still hidden by the box, you already knew what this girl looked like. She had sharp eyes and long purple hair held into pigtails with a pair of gray clips. The girl in the box lifted you up to the hole near the top, where her eyes mysteriously glowed through the darkness.

"Sss Sss Sss... Hmmm, what have we here? A tiny little man? Interesting, very interesting. I wonder what I should do with you, little pipsqueak... Maybe I should keep you to myself as my own personal servant. Or maybe I could advertise you in the themis herald and use you to draw some new members to join the newspaper club. I'm sured there would be LOTS of cute girls who would jump at the opportunity to join my club and have a miniature man to play with however they want. Then again, I'm not exactly sure if I want to share you with anyone else... Hmmm, what to do, what to do..."

After a bit of thought, Myriam decides to...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The biggest and smallest scoop ever!

choices: Myriam has you finish her foot massage while she talks with the new members.
One of the other girls has something in mind for you.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Myriam held you, her slender fingers wrapped tightly around your tiny frame, as she considered what to do next. After a few moments passed, she finally came to a decision. She set you down on the ground and pinned your lower body beneath her foot. The pressure was painful, but it was nothing too major. She clearly didn't want to break her new toy too quickly.

"You know, fun as it is running this operation without anyone to complain about the way I do things, being the only member of the newspaper club is a lot of hard work. You're going to be my ticket to getting a few new members to join, alright shrimp?"

"Y-you can't turn me into your club plaything! I'm a-" Your argument was cut short as your captor peeled one of the bandaids off of her finger, picked you up from once again, and wrapped the bandaid around your head to silence you. Luckily there was just enough of a gap left to allow you to breath, but any attempts at speaking were muffled and undecipherable.

"Sss Sss Sss... You're a tiny little shrimp with a big mouth is what you are. I can do whatever I want with you, so just get used to it. Pretty soon I won't be the only one playing with you."

And at that, your box-clad captor carried you off toward the school building and entered the newpaper club's club room. With the bandaid covering your entire head, you couldn't even see where you were being taken. You had no idea what was going on until you were roughly dropped onto what you assumed to be a desk and the bandaid was quickly peeled off of your head, which was far less painful than you expected it to be. You assumed that this was due to most of the bandaid's stickiness being used up when it was wrapped around Myriams finger.

Before you even had any time to move or react, you felt a pencil being pressed against your back, and then that same bandaid being wrapped around your chest to secure you to said pencil. Myriam then pulled out a camera and began taking pictures of you from various angles. Once your little photo session was over, Myriam removed her box disguise and sat down at a computer in the corner of the room. Plugging in her camera, she set to work in creating the next issue of the themis herald, where she would advertise you as bait to draw in new members. When she finally finished and printed out the paper, she turned to the back page to show you the advertisement she had created.

'HUGE discovery! New species that highly resembles a human male! Just 3 inches tall! Only one known to exist! Join the newpaper club for free access to this bizarre tiny creature!'


Below that text was a large picture of you, and below that was a bit more information about the newpaper club. At the very bottom of the page, there was some small red text that said: 'The newspaper club is only open to girls. No boys allowed.'

"Sss Sss Sss... How do you like that, shrimp? Just you wait, soon enough this place will be flooded with new members!"

The next week Myriam circulated the new issue of her per throughout the school. A couple days passed and there were no signs of any new members coming to join the club.

"Why, why, WHY?! Why hasn't anyone showed up yet?! Don't they realize what an amazing once in a lifetime opportunity this is?!" Myriam yelled, slamming her fists down onto the desk.

"They probably don't believe that I actually exist. Anyone can make a picture like that with a little photo editing." You pointed out.

"Shut up and keep rubbing my feet, shrimp. I'm not in the mood for your sassing right now." Myriam said, sighing and laying her head down on the desk.

"Yeah, yeah. Whatever you say." You mutter as you continue giving your owner a foot massage.

This had become routine since she mad you her club pet. She would often kick off her shoes and place you under her desk while she worked, forcing you to massage her feet to help her relax. At first Myriam was really mean to you, treating you more like a slave than a pet, but after the first few days the thrill of having a tiny life completely under her control started to wear off. By now she was fairly indifferent toward you. She would give you an order every now and then and you would follow it, but she didn't pay much attention to you beyond that. At the end of each day she would turn her box upside-down and drop you into it, and you would have to sleep in there until she came back the next day.

This was what your life had become now, and with still no memory of what your past life was like, you had no what of knowing rather or not this might actually be an improvement. After all, pet or not, at least Myriam provided you with consistent meals and shelter. For all you knew, the past you might not have even had that.

Suddenly, just as you were losing yourself in your daily ritual of massaging your giantess owner's surprisingly soft bare feet, a knock on the door snapped you out of your trance. Myriam quickly jumped out of her chair, knocking you over in the process, and rushed over to answer the door. As she opened the door, Myriam saw the last two people that she expected to: Juniper Woods and Robin Newman. Instantly the smile of excitement faded from her face.

"Oh, it's you... What are you here for? I doubt that you're here to join the newspaper club..."

"Actually, that's exactly why we're here. That little guy in the picture is real, right? He's the cutest thing EVEEER! I wanna play with him!" Robin said.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: So, when do you want to meet Aura?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Postgame Aura, during or after her prison sente...

choices: You regain consciousness immediately, and Aura decides to question you.
You remain out cold, so Aura takes you back to her lab to care for you.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
This was it, the day had finally come. As Aura Blackquill stepped out of the prison doors and into the outside world, she couldn't help but let out a sigh of relief. After what was without a doubt the longest year of her life, her prison sentence had finally come to an end. At long last she was free once again, and it was all thanks to...

"That Princess... She truly is amazing. Not only getting Simon off of death row, but even managing to get my sentence reduced to just one year after the stunt I pulled. I... I really do owe her everything now, don't I?" Aura began to laugh to herself as she realized what she was saying.

To think that the person who she had held a grudge against for so many years, the person she had despised with every fiber of her being for killing her beloved mentor, would turn out to be the person that she was the most grateful to now. Even after she had held everyone in the Cosmos Space Center hostage in an attempt to get Athena convicted of murdering her own mother, that girl still went out of her way to defend her when it came time for her own trial.

Of course there was no way to avoid a guilty verdict in this case, but she defended her anyway and managed to convince the judge to reduce her sentence in light of all the good that came out of her actions. Thanks to her hostage situation forcing that retrial, Simon Blackquill was proven innocent, and with that the dark age of the law was beginning to slowly fade away. What's more, the Phantom who had been the cause of it all was finally brought to justice. Yes, Aura had committed a terrible crime, that much was undeniable. But she had only done it for the sake of her brother, and so much good had come as a result of it. It was thanks to Athena bringing that to the judge's attention that she was able to walk the streets again so soon.

Aura smiled to herself as she thought about it. Those events had given her a new lease on life, and she wasn't going to let the past tie her down anymore. Much as the loss of her mentor still pained her, she knew that she had to move on. With her long hair being blown about in the breeze, Aura looked to the sky and felt truly happy for the first time in years.

"I haven't gotten any joy out of looking up at the sky like this since the day I lost you, Metis... But now, now it looks more beautiful than it ever did before. Your daughter has grown into a truly amazing young woman. I'm sure that you must be so very proud of her." Aura said to herself, placing her hand over her heart as she gazed skyward.

However, just as Aura was about to get on her way, she saw something small falling out of the sky. Said something was heading right toward her. Thinking fast, she quickly reached out her hands to catch this tiny something before it hit the ground. As she carefully caught the tiny object with both hands, Aura began to examine it to find out just what this strange little thing was.

Much to her surprise, the object that she now held in her hands wasn't an object at all. Rather, it was in fact an incredibly small human male! Aura couldn't believe her eyes. How could such a tiny person possibly exist? It completely went against every scientific principal that she knew. The human body shouldn't be able to survive at such a small size, and yet from what she could tell you were still breathing, just unconscious.

Aura simply stands there for a moment, too amazed by this discovery of hers to even think about anything else. After a bit more time passes...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Aura's new lease on life
