1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Rayfa Padma Khura'in!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
You slowly regain consciousness and open your eyes. Your eyes suddenly open wide in surprise as you do not recognize where you are. It appears to be a Japanese sort of bedroom, but with a somewhat different atmosphere to it. Just then, you hear footsteps approaching. When the owner of those footsteps enters the room, you see the Royal Priestess of the Kingdom of Khura'in, Rayfa Padma Khura'in from the new Ace Attorney game Spirit of Justice. She is currently wearing her robe and holding her staff, but she then puts her staff down in one corner of her room and hangs her robe up on a rack near the staff.

Afterwards, she moves to her bed and sits down. You had to dodge her feet to avoid her stepping on you, as you were near her bed when you awoke. You let out a sigh of relief but then hear a gasp.

"Pohlkuna!" a voice above you exclaims.

You turn your head around and look above you. You see Rayfa looking down at you with her left hand held in front of her mouth. You two stare at each other until Rayfa's face mouth forms a...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: After Spirit of Justice ends

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Before you can react, Rayfa picks you up and you find yourself lying on your back as you lie on her left hand.

"Well this is a surprising trun of events." Rayfa spoke as she maintained a smug smile. "And what are you supposed to be? Some sort of tiny spy? Well you can't be a good one considering the difference in our sizes! Ha!"

You tried to to speak and say that you are not a spy but you couldn't seem to get the words out. This made you feel completly scared and you shook with fear as you curled up into a ball.

"Oh, you're just a scared little tiny!" Rayfa said with wide eyes. "Well i guess i won't punish you. But we can still have fun now!"

You looked a bit worried upon hearing that statement.

"I'll make sure you are kept safe with an ancient Khura'inese incantaion...........if you agree to be my little pet!"

You flinched slighlty upon hearing this offer but you had no choice but to accept it and you nodded.

"Splendid!" Rayfa declaired with joy. "My mother, Queen Amara knows the incantaion but first, i want to play with you a little! First i want to play with you............
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Picked up by a princess

choices: Yes.  Another round of mouth play incoming.
No.  She presses her lips to you instead.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"First, I want to play with you in my mouth!" she said.

You're eyes widen in fear as she closes her fingers around you. You struggle in her grip as she brings you closer to her pink lips. She sees you struggling in her grasp and laughs at you're futile attempt to escape.

"You needn't be afraid, my pet," she said petting your head gently with her other hand, "I am just going to play with you in my mouth. I will not swallow you. You might enjoy it too."

With that said, she opens her mouth wide and places you into her maw. Her jaw closes around you. Her tongue then begins rolling you around in her mouth, covering you in her saliva. You struggle to get out, but her tongue easily overpowers you. She then wraps her tongue around your body and sucks on you. You can hear her moaning in delight as she savors your taste and plays with you in her mouth.

After several minutes of being played with in her mouth, she spits you out onto her hand and her fingers close around you. She lifts you up in front of her face and smiles.

"Now, that wasn't so bad, was it?" she asks you.

Of course, you can't reply with words, so you just shake your head to say it wasn't. Rayfa giggles at you and brings you closer to her mouth again. You worry that she might put you back in her mouth again. Does she?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Her Benevolence tastes you

info.brief_description: You wake up in the hands of one of the lovely ladies from the Ace Attorney series!
info.description:
You wake up one day to find that you are only about 2 inches tall and in the vicinity of one of the girls from the Ace Attorney series, like Mia and Maya Fey, Trucy Wright, and Franziska von Karma!
I won't delete much of anything as long as you follow these simple rules:

1- You may be shrunken in the presence of more than one girl at a time, but keep this at a minimum.
2- To ensure a first person point of view for most viewers, please do not assign the person a name. Only refer to your character in the second person (ex: YOU looked up. YOU told her YOUR name) you get the point by now.
3- Though most fetishes will be allowed please try to refrain from insertion, death, and digestion(though they are okay, don't overuse them). Mouthplay and vore (strictly oral) is completely fine.
4- No male/male interaction allowed
5- Your character is roughly 2-4 inches tall. Please keep it in that range and refrain from altering the size of anyone or anything else.
6- The girls can be whatever kind of giantess you want: kind, cruel, playful or apathetic, but give them a good reason to be those things and please try to keep them in character.
7- PLEASE use decent grammar and punctuation and keep the story in English.
8- Try to refrain from killing or ending the story early, if you do, give another option for a different outcome.
9- Though I will allow a short chapter once in a while, I will delete if you post nothing but one or 2 sentence chapters.

All of the Ace Attorney games and female characters are included, so let's jump in!


GPs for good additions! Have fun!

Edit 6/5/13: 100 chapters reached!!

Edit 11/5/13: Now that Dual Destinies is released, be warned that this interactive may contain spoilers to the game! You have been warned~!

Edit 5/11/14: Over 20,000 views!! Thank you all so much for checking this story out, but I could really use you additions as well!

Edit 9/27/16: Spirit of Justice is now released as well, more potential spoilers ahead~!
